content:
@WG-prioritization/alerts issue #92113 has been requested for prioritization.

Procedure

  • Priority?
  • Regression?
  • Notify people/groups?
  • Needs I-nominated?
Seems like a regression in the suggestion (the help hint is missing). I think p-medium (or lower...)
I'd be okay with either of those, but I'd personally call it a P-medium.

P-low to me means "feel free to submit a fix if you'd like". As opposed to P-medium, which is "this should get fixed sooner or later". Here, it seems to me that the old behavior is helpful for a newcomer, which is definitely something we care about for diagnostics.
I agree (with p-low) this is a relatively small regression from #86986 and the issue reporter is already working to a fix, so it is definitively under control
